newsitem.title: BAHRAIN: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Saudi Arabia - Dec 5.

text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Saudi Arabian press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Security is to top the agenda of the Gulf Cooperation Council summit, which is due to begin in the Qatari capital Doha on Saturday.
- Moslem countries contributed 15 percent to the $1.8 billion aid granted by the international community for the reconstruction of Bosnia, the country's prime minister said.
- Ten Saudi banks posted net profits of 3.1 billion riyals in 1995.
- Saudi's Riyad Bank offered a second investment fund.
- More than one billion Saudi riyals were invested in the past three years to boost the capacity of the Saudi Consolidated Electric Company - South, the company's general manager said.
